name: Woodland Terror
overview: Number 2 in the Firienwood adventure series. Knowledge of Firienwood, the first adventure, is not needed for you to play this game. Many ages ago, an intrepid adventure journeyed into the enchanted Firienwood on a quest to find the Golden Bird Of Paradise. After many trials our hero succeeded, but he also released from a lamp an evil Genie, who has enslaved the local inhabitants. Your task is to find the lamp and re-imprison the Genie, thus freeing an unhappy land from tyranny.
